creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mrs Jackson Burke
description: four long lines of calligraphy; teal blue mount
inscription: 孤鸿海上来/池潢不敢顾/侧见双翠鳥/巢在三珠樹/矯ヽ珍木巅/得无金丸惧/美服患人指/高明逼神恶/今我游冥冥/弋者何所慕(see Stephen Addiss\'s translation in the object file)
markings: URC,oval intaglio: 筆補造化; LLC, square intaglio: 寒天寿印; LLC, square relief:酔晋斎; label L and R roller ends: [Tenju]; center top dowel, in pencil: [Tenju 4 Lines];
title: Poem by Zhang Jiuling
